text: wayawm yahshr allah hwla' almushrikin yawm albaeth walhsab, ka'anahum qabl dhlk lm ymkthu fi alhayat aldunya 'iilaa qadr saeatan min alnhar, yaerif baeduhum bedana khalhm fi aldnya, thuma ainqataeat tilk almaerifat wanqdt tilk alsae. qad khasir aladhin kafaruu wkdhdhabu biliqa' allah wthwabh weqabh, wama kanuu mwffaqyn li'iisabat alrushd fima felu
